welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bexleyheath, a charming town known for its beautiful parks, historical landmarks, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all freight and cargo shipments at Rochester Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers personalized services for VIP passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free by selecting the 'Northolt Airport WiFi' network and entering the provided password.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gatwick Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The second terminal at Gatwick Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 90-minute time limit per session.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The busiest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly non-Star Alliance international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly British Airways and Oneworld alliance airlines.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, then paid options available.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
